Hydras/Nigthlight:

Hydras sned a private message to Scorponok "Keep an eye=
 in Nightshift, in maximals and Autobots... sometthing isnt all right" then=
 he open the comlink  to Cyclonus "I dont want that any bot either maximal,=
 autobot  or Predacon can enter in that area with out permission of me or P=
erceptor; I want that you fill up Rodimus the situation in the ark... somet=
hing is wrong there"
Hydras continue to cheking the situation in the ark


=
*******************************************

Nightlight:


the girls smiled=
 and fall sleep again


From: Preston Carroll 
Sent: Wednesday, March 24, 2=
010 2:28 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
Subject: Re: BlackFortress


  
OOC=
: Oops, sorry, missed your reposting :)

> Hydras hissed "i have an importa=
nt task for you Cyclonus: I want you to insolate the resheach area, made it=
 impossible to someone come in and out... and leave the acces signature in =
blank... I'll fill it when you finish; Perceptor will start soon to do some=
 importan reseach and I want it that no body mess with. I want that you do =
that asap; I'll ask Rodimus to continue tracking the situation in the ark" =
then he opened his comlink and said "Rodimus, i need you here in Segurity R=
oom, Cyclonus will up date you"

Cyclonus looked at Hydras quizzically and =
then nodded. "Of course." he
said, stowed his transmitter away in a safe pl=
ace as he did so.

Scourge walked up behind Cyclonus, as if ready to follow=
 his commander
should the need arise. "I wonder why the Maximals have not c=
ome out in
bigger numbers to defend their Ark?" Scourge said under his brea=
th.

Looking over at Scourge, Cyclonus nodded, "The thought had occurred to=

me as well." he said thoughtfully.

********************************

Mean=
while . . .

> Nightlight smiled and slighty blushed when Rodimus took her =
hand and shyly smiled but that smile fades when she heard Hydras request an=
d said "if you have to go to combat, do you promise that will you come back=
? do you promise that will you take care yourself?"

Rodimus slowly slid hi=
s hand from on hers and rose, reluctant to do
so, but he knew where his dut=
y was, and that was with Hydras. He
nodded to her, a confident smile bloomi=
ng on his face, "I will be
back." his voice as confident as his smile, "I'v=
e got to make sure you
are up on your feet right?"

With a hesitant wave he=
 turned to leave the room, making sure that it
was locked secure as he left=
. Only those with the proper clearance
would be able to get through the doo=
r. He quickly began his swift walk
towards Hydras' location as he activated=
 his radio, "I'm on my way."
he said.

As he walked, he frowned, "I'm repor=
ting to Cyclonus?" Rodimus said in
a voice too low to be heard by the radio=
. "Over my deactivated
chassis."

(TAG)

Preston
